content: We're also going to be running another study 314 study, which we'll look at a younger age with very high fraction, which we'll randomize from setrusumab or bisphosphonate, which is used in those very severe young patients, which gives us another way to demonstrate the powerful effect, particularly in the young patients where we â from our own experience in rare bone diseases, the young patients can really respond to a new drug in a profound way.
